title: I'm Not Getting Promoted to the Next Divison
body:
So, I'm in Bronze 1 and have made it to my promos 4 times; somehow after 2 losses, it says that I've lost my promos instead of losing 3 games. I also tried my promos again the other day and after 2 wins and 1 loss I also "did not complete my series".
Also, every time I lose in my promos to Silver I'm also losing LP for it. 
Anyone else experienced this?

replies.body:
Is it possible that you are dodging one of your matches? Dodging during your promos counts as a loss.

As for losing LP, this is normal. You win and lose LP as usual while in your promos; if you win you can get over 100 LP but it will never show more than 100, which can be confusing when afterwards you lose a match and still have 100.
